mcq.statement: Who was the Nawab of Awadh that supported Ahmad Shah Abdali in the Third Battle of Panipat?
mcq.one_liner: In the Third Battle of Panipat, **Shuja-ud-Daulah** was the Nawab of Awadh who supported Ahmad Shah Abdali.
